channel.title: CVE Feed for themeworm -- Plexx Elementor Extension
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themeworm -- Plexx Elementor Extension

item.title: CVE-2024-49234|2024-10-18T13:35:51.315Z -- themeworm -- plexx%20elementor%20extension
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in themeworm Plexx Elementor Extension allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Plexx Elementor Extension: from n/a through 1.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-49234|2024-10-18T09:49:14.737Z -- themeworm -- plexx%20elementor%20extension
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in themeworm Plexx Elementor Extension allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Plexx Elementor Extension: from n/a through 1.3.4.
